text: aur ye log khud jin baaton ko pasand nahin karate unako khuda ke vaaste qaraar dete hain aur apanee hee zabaan se ye jhoothe daave bhee karate hain ki (aakhirat mein bhee) unheen ke lie bhalaee hai (bhalaee to nahin magar) haan unake lie jahannum kee aag zaruree hai aur yahee log sabase pahale (usamen) jhonke jaengen
